thread.title: Nicholas Leiby Joins Weinberg Capital Group

author: cnbc.com
title: Nicholas Leiby Joins Weinberg Capital Group
text:
CLEVELAND--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Chip Weinberg, Managing Director & Principal of Weinberg Capital Group, announced today the appointment of Nicholas Leiby to the position of Director.
“We are excited that Nick has joined our team. He is a talented individual and brings a wealth of experience to our firm,” Weinberg said.
Leiby began his career in public accounting with Deloitte, where he provided assurance services to both public and private companies across a wide variety of industries while he earned his CPA.
Following his tenure at Deloitte, Nick joined the Consumer & Retail Investment Banking group at KeyBanc Capital Markets, where he provided M&A advisory and capital markets services to companies located across the U.S.
Following his time at KeyBanc, Nick transitioned his career into private equity, first serving as an Associate at Kirtland Capital Partners and, most recently, as Vice President at Resilience Capital Partners — both middle-market firms based in Cleveland, OH.
While at Resilience, Nick was responsible for evaluating new investment opportunities, performing due diligence, and working with portfolio company senior management teams to execute on their value creation plans.
Mr. Leiby graduated from Ohio University with a BBA in Accounting & Business Pre-Law and received his MBA from the Ross School of Business at the University of Michigan.
Weinberg Capital Group is a Cleveland, Ohio based private equity group whose principals consist of Ronald E. Weinberg, Ronald E. (Chip) Weinberg, Jr., and John E. Herman. The firm invests in well-positioned middle market companies.
Weinberg Capital Group focuses on firms where the current ownership and management reinvest in the transaction, and management remains in place, affording current shareholders and management an opportunity to achieve liquidity coupled with ownership continuity.
The firm invests in companies throughout North America with annual revenue from $15 to $100 million and EBITDA ranging from $2 to $10 million. The firm's current portfolio covers a broad range of industries including manufacturing, business services, aviation services, financial services, consumer products, retail and value-added distribution.
Additional information on Weinberg Capital Group can be found at www.weinbergcap.com .
